casebody.data:
CARTER NEIGHBORS LIMITED, Plaintiff,
v.
The EDWIN RECTOR 1995 CHARITABLE TRUST and Edwin Rector, Defendants,
The Edwin Rector 1995 Charitable Trust, by and through its Trustee, Edwin Rector, Third Party Plaintiff,
v.
Sun Raye Financial Company Incorporated, a North Carolina Corporation, Carter Neighbors Limited, a North Carolina Corporation d/b/a Sonny's Used Cars, Lannie Dean Carter, Jr., George K. Clardy, Jr., and Eagle Services and Towing LLC, d/b/a Eagle Auto, Third Party Defendants. No. COA14-1212. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Aug. 18, 2015.

CASE REPORTED WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Dismissed.
